name: Product View Tracker
author: wahid sadik

sections.installation: Installation is straightforward. Install the plugin directly from the WordPress plugin repository.
sections.changelog:
0.5

  • Initial version release

1.2.4

  • Added support for WooCommerce integration.
  • Enhanced search functionality.
  • Improved UI for better user experience.
sections.description:
Short Description

The Product View Tracker plugin empowers WordPress site owners to effortlessly monitor and showcase the popularity of products. Admins gain valuable analytics on which products attract the most attention, aiding in strategic decision-making. Meanwhile, customers benefit from transparency and informed purchasing decisions as they explore trending and frequently viewed items.

Features of Product View Tracker:

  • Product View Tracking: Track and display the number of views for each product in a comprehensive table format.
  • Last View Timestamp: View the timestamp of the last recorded view for detailed analysis.
  • Search Functionality: Admins can search for specific products using an intuitive search box. Search results dynamically update as keywords are entered, facilitating quick product lookup.
  • Category Filtering: Filter product views by selecting categories from a dropdown menu. Admins can analyze product popularity within specific categories to tailor marketing strategies.

Support

For any questions or concerns, please contact us at wahidsadik38@gmail.com. We are committed to providing prompt assistance and support.
